about.subTitle: Passionate about creating web solutions and enthusiastic about AI, always exploring new ways to innovate and improve processes
about.firstParagraph: I am a full stack web developer with extensive experience in front-end. I have solid knowledge in jQuery, React, Next.js, and previous experience with Gatsby, which allows me to create intuitive and dynamic user interfaces, always applying the best practices and available technologies. My dedication to front-end development drives me to constantly strive for excellence and create engaging and accessible user experiences.
about.secondParagraph: In the back-end, I work efficiently using Node.js and Python to create REST APIs and develop automated ETL processes. I also have some experience with Java, which allows me to leverage its strengths in building robust backend services. My solid knowledge in relational databases, especially SQL Server, enables me to effectively manage and integrate data in complex systems
about.thirdParagraph: As a software engineer, I value efficiency in creating robust and scalable solutions. I prioritize writing clean and well-structured code, ensuring that solutions are sustainable and easy to maintain. Additionally, I am a strong advocate for AI, constantly exploring new technologies to optimize and transform processes, believing in AI's potential to revolutionize software development

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subTitle: Some of my experiences as a developer and student
experiences.card1title: Introduction to the world of development
experiences.card1description: My first 'Hello World'. It was here where I began studying on my own and became self-taught.
experiences.card2description: After building a solid knowledge base, I decided to deepen my studies through the development of personal projects.
experiences.card3description: After a year of self-study and skill development, I decided to enroll in the Software Analysis and Development course at Universidade Cruzeiro do Sul.
experiences.card4description: This is where I began working as a developer, working on web applications as a full stack developer.
experiences.card5description: Here, I worked as a systems analyst, conducting requirements gathering, systems modeling, and web application development using jQuery, Node.js, and SQL Server.
experiences.card6description: This is where I graduated as a systems analyst, learned database management, developed web and mobile applications, and primarily honed my skills in software engineering.
experiences.card7description: Currently, I work full-time as a systems analyst at Octea. In my spare time, I work as a freelancer and continue to deepen my knowledge in various areas of technology, such as web application development, data science, machine learning, etc.

resume.subtitle: Passionate about creating web solutions and enthusiastic about AI, always exploring new ways to innovate and improve processes

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: I've worked on a handful of web projects over the years, some of which were for the following organizations:

one.description: Responsible for creating web applications from scratch and implementing new features in existing applications. I acted on requirements analysis, front-end development, and back-end development, ensuring efficient integration between different systems. I used good programming practices and agile development principles to deliver high-quality and scalable solutions.

activities.one: Creation of features and support for front-end applications using React.js, Next.js, Gatsby.js, and other technologies.
activities.two: Creation of features and support for back-end applications using Node.js, Express.js, Koa.js, Nest.js, and other technologies.
activities.three: Control of version control with Git.
activities.four: Utilization of cloud services such as AWS, including EC2, SES, and Lambda.

two.description: Worked as a systems analyst and full-stack developer, creating complex systems from scratch and providing support for existing applications. Responsible for requirements analysis and gathering, interface creation, back-end services development (including APIs, automated processes, scheduled tasks, and ETL processes), relational database structure modeling, and implementation.

activities.one: Creation of features and support for existing front-end functionalities with jQuery.
activities.two: Development of APIs REST with Node.js.
activities.three: Development of structures and processes with relational databases (SQL Server).
activities.four: Analysis of requirements and system modeling.
activities.six: Creation of ETL processes (Extract, Transform, Load) with Python and SQL Server.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Links to some of my work can be found on isaquedev/projects and details can be provided upon request via a scheduled demo call.
